ActionItemId_Desc: Item Id of the item that the event action was invoked on
BackgroundColor_Desc: The background color of the drop zone
BorderColor_Desc: The border color of the drop zone
BorderRadius_Desc: Border radius of the drop zone area  (px)
BorderWidth_Desc: Border width of the drop zone area (px)
CurrentItems_Desc: The current items with information describing their position and zone
DelaySelect_Desc: Delay the selection of items to prevent accidental dragging
Direction_Desc: The direction to render the items in the list
DroppedId_Desc: The Id of the item dropped
DroppedPosition_Desc: Position of the dropped item relative to the other times in the zone (if sort is allowed) or relative to the whole input (if sort is prevented)
DroppedSource_Desc: Zone Id of the source zone
DroppedTarget_Desc: Zone Id of the target zone
DropZoneID_Desc: Set to a unique name for this drop zone (without spaces)
InputEvent_Desc: Set to unique event name to trigger Reset and ClearClanges
IsMasterZone_Desc: Set to true to link this zone to the other drop zones. All events will be raised on this control.
ItemFont_Desc: Font for each item (can be overriden by templates)
ItemFontColor_Desc: Font color for each item (can be overriden by templates)
ItemFontSize_Desc: Font size for each item  (can be overriden by templates)
items_Desc: The items to link to the drop zone - zone filtering happens internally.
ItemTemplate_Desc: Custom HTML template for each item
MaximumItems_Desc: (Optional) A comma separated list of maximum number of items for each zone. Set to -1 for no limit.
OnAction_Desc: Event raised when a template action is invoked
OnDrop_Desc: Event raised when an item is dropped
OtherDropZoneIDs_Desc: (Optional) Comma separated list of other drop zone IDs to link to this drop zone if it is designated as a master drop zone
PreserveSort_Desc: Preserve the sort order of the items based on the input dataset
RotateOnDrag_Desc: Rotate the item as it is dragged to create a 'hanging' effect
Scroll_Desc: Allow automatic scrolling inside the drop zone
Wrap_Desc: Control wrapping of the items in the list
